name: Ultra Polymerization
text: Pay 2000 LP; Fusion Summon 1 Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using 2 monsters you control as Fusion Materials. Neither player can activate cards or effects in response to this card's activation. You can banish this card from your Graveyard, then target 1 Fusion Monster that was Fusion Summoned by this card's effect; Special Summon all the Fusion Materials that were used for its Fusion Summon from your Graveyard, but change their ATK and DEF to 0, also they have their effects negated.
